134996802208485268.Text: Tall stalk with triple radiating leaves at intervals along the stalk. Marshmerrow's good for restore health potions. Mixes with corkbulb. And what most folks don't know, corprus weepings also have healing properties.

45566106121197279.Text: The sweet pulp of marshmerrow reeds is a delectable foodstuff, and when eaten fresh or prepared, it has modest healing properties. Marshmerrow is an important cash crop of the farms and plantations of the Ascadian Isles, but it also grows wild in the Grazelands and on Azura's Coast.
